data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Suarez-Morales, Eduardo, Kozak, Eva (2012): Redescription of the poorly known planktonic copepod Pontellopsis lubbockii (Giesbrecht, 1889) (Pontellidae) from the Eastern Tropical Pacific with a key to species. ZooKeys 234: 1-18, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.234.3933, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.234.3933
